drag_and_drop: Drag and drop a file here or browse
about_tree_september_2020_popover_text_0: The idea is born: After receiving a request to plan a scavenger hunt for his nephew, Thilo Konstanzer decided to create not just a scavenger hunt, but rather an adventure for groups of children, 2 - 3 hours of puzzle fun with a big treasure as a reward at the end!
about_tree_september_2020_popover_text_1: But during the planning phase, the Escape Room fan had another idea. Why only for children? Adults have just as much fun with puzzles.
about_tree_september_2020_popover_text_2: A children's adventure and an adult adventure at the Kaiserstuhl were to be created
faq_title_book: Questions about Book of the 7 Seals
faq_title_linden: Questions about Curse of the 9 Linden Trees
faq_description: Here you can find our FAQ page and find the answer you need.
h1_teambuilding: Find your escape-game for your Teambuilding
need_teambuilding: Need a team-building activity? Our escapes games are for you
teambuilding_steps_text: Tired of struggling with the endless details that go into any successful team building event? Then let it go. We’re built to handle even the most complex productions. So you can relax, knowing every need has been anticipated. Go ahead – give yourself permission to have fun at your own team event for a change. It’s about time.
get_in_touch: Lets get in touch and talk about it
message_support_team: Your message will be copied to support team.
teambuilding_company: These company celebrate their teambuilding with us
teambuilding_argumentary_0_text: Outdoor escape adventures require strong communication between team members. Participants have to solve puzzles and develop strategies to complete tasks together. This promotes effective communication.
teambuilding_argumentary_1_text: The nature of escape adventures requires teamwork and co-operation. Skills and strengths must be combined to overcome challenges. This shows how important it is to trust and utilise these to achieve common goals.
teambuilding_argumentary_2_text: Shared experiences of success such as those experienced by a team in our outdoor escape adventures not only promote communication and cohesion, they also form a strong basis for future success in the office.
teambuilding_steps_0_text: Choose your event or a series of events to fit your goals, budget and calendar. We’re always happy to help with this important first step.
teambuilding_steps_1_text: There’s real power in strategically tailoring a team event. Customizing around company culture, location, etc. can make all the difference.
teambuilding_steps_2_text: Every event has at least 4 zillion important details. Our event managers are really good at coordinating all of them, so you don’t have to.
teambuilding_steps_3_text: Your facilitator and onsite staff deliver an energetic, engaging program. Everyone has fun. Goals are achieved. You get to be the hero.
policy_description_condition: The site accessible via the following url: we-escape.de is operated in compliance with French legislation. Use of this site is governed by these terms and conditions. By using the site, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted these conditions.
policy_title_collect: Collection and processing of personal data
policy_description_collect: we-escape undertakes to respect the confidentiality of personal data collected (passwords, e-mail addresses, surnames, first names). This information is collected for the purpose of providing the services offered by the site and will not be passed on to third parties without your consent. In accordance with the French Data Protection Act of January 6, 1978, amended in 2004, you have the right to access and rectify information concerning you, which you may exercise by contacting contact@we-escape.de.
policy_description_property: All content on the we-escape website, including but not limited to graphics, images, texts, videos, animations, sounds, logos, gifs and icons, as well as their layout, are the exclusive property of the company, with the exception of trademarks, logos or content belonging to other partner companies or authors. The reproduction, modification, distribution or any other use of the site content, other than for personal, non-commercial use, is strictly forbidden without the prior written authorization of we-escape.
policy_description_link: we-escape websites may provide links to other websites or resources available on the Internet. we-escape has no means of controlling the sites linked to its websites. We-escape is not responsible for the availability of such external sites and sources, nor does it guarantee them. We-escape cannot be held responsible for any damage whatsoever resulting from the content of such external sites or sources.

h1_home: Break out of your normal escapes. Go outside.Touch grass.
hero_home_text: Where mystery meets the great outdoors, Kaiserstuhl Escape lets you unleash your inner explorer.
escapes_container_h2: Where do you want to escape ?
offer_your_adventure: Offer your adventure to your loved ones
because_experience: Because experiences are more valuable than material gifts.
review_home_h3: Hear it straight from them, real talk
review_card_text_0: The escape was really good, I especially love the part were there was women. I love women, and I think they should do more jobs where they are close to us like this.
ask_anything: Ask us anything or just say hi,
jobs_hero_title:
Join us, team players.
Your talents make people's life shine.
jobs_content_case_0_text_0: We are a dedicated young team
jobs_content_case_0_text_1: We take team training seriously and hope to make you grow
jobs_content_case_0_text_2: We search for long-term dedicated team members
jobs_content_case_1_text_0: We believe a good pay is a key to your happiness
jobs_content_case_1_text_1: We leave you free of the hours that matter for you.
jobs_content_case_2_text_0: You are someone we can count on to be reliable
jobs_content_case_2_text_1: You believe in team work and are happy to be in one
jobs_content_case_2_text_2: You have no criminal record and you’re over 18
jobs_content_case_3_text_0: You can adapt to most situations quickly.
jobs_content_case_3_text_1: You make good initiatives by yourself
jobs_content_case_title_2:

looking for help in:

center_mulhouse_quiz_question_0: What is the name of this historic building ?
center_mulhouse_quiz_question_1: What year was Temple of Mulhouse built ?
center_mulhouse_quiz_question_2: What is the particularity of this pharmacy ?
center_mulhouse_quiz_question_3: Take a look at the Caisse d'Epargne, a clue in the frontage gives you an idea of what the building used to be like. What was the building before it became a bank?
fragrance_garden_quiz_question_0: By who this garden was built ?
fragrance_garden_quiz_question_1: Why this doctor made this garden?
fragrance_garden_quiz_question_2: What is the goal of this garden ?
fragrance_garden_quiz_question_3: How many species of plant are here?
center_mulhouse_quiz_question_2_2: The first to be run by a woman
center_mulhouse_quiz_question_2_3: Destroyed in the First World War
fragrance_garden_quiz_question_2_3: Enabling people to use their sense of smell as a guide
